AttackerCapabilities: Basic knowledge of HTML source code
Ability to search for specific content in source code

Vulnerabilities: Lack of access control to view HTML source code
Inclusion of sensitive information in HTML source code

Steps.Description: The attacker views the source code of the HTML file.

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker hypothesizes that the flag may be present in the HTML source code.
StepDetails.Action: The attacker presses Ctrl + U on their browser to view the source code of the HTML file.
StepDetails.Result: The attacker finds the flag in the HTML source code.

Steps.Description: The attacker searches for the flag{...} format in the HTML source code.

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker hypothesizes that the flag may be in the flag{...} format.
StepDetails.Action: The attacker searches for the flag{...} format in the HTML source code.
StepDetails.Result: The attacker finds the flag{1nspector_g3n3ral_at_w0rk} in the HTML source code.
